topic: Watermarking and Copyright Protection for Large Language Models and Diffusion Models

  entities:
    Xiaoze Liu|Researcher
    John Kirchenbauer|Researcher
    Ruisi Zhang|Researcher
    Lean Wang|Researcher
    Leyi Pan|Researcher
    Shen Li|Researcher
    Gowthami Somepalli|Researcher
    Nikhil Vyas|Researcher
    Yuxin Wen|Researcher
    Zhe Ma|Researcher
    Yingqian Cui|Researcher
    Yunqing Zhao|Researcher
    Pierre Fernandez|Researcher
    Liangqi Lei|Researcher
    Cheng Xiong|Researcher
    SHIELD|Tool
    REMARK-LLM|Framework
    MarkLLM|Toolkit
    Double-I Watermark|Method
    DiffusionShield|Tool
    FT-Shield|Tool
    Stable Signature|Method
    DiffuseTrace|Method

  proposition: Xiaoze Liu and colleagues published SHIELD for evaluating and defending copyright compliance in LLM text generation.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiaoze Liu|DEVELOPED|SHIELD
    SHIELD|FOCUSES_ON|Copyright Compliance
    SHIELD|APPLIES_TO|Large Language Models

  proposition: John Kirchenbauer and authors proposed a watermark for large language models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    John Kirchenbauer|PROPOSED|Watermark
    Watermark|APPLIES_TO|Large Language Models

  proposition: Ruisi Zhang et al. developed REMARK-LLM, a robust watermarking framework for generative large language models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Ruisi Zhang|DEVELOPED|REMARK-LLM
    REMARK-LLM|APPLIES_TO|Generative Large Language Models

  proposition: Lean Wang and team worked towards codable text watermarking for large language models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Lean Wang|RESEARCHED|Codable Text Watermarking
    Codable Text Watermarking|APPLIES_TO|Large Language Models

  proposition: Leyi Pan and colleagues created MarkLLM, an open-source toolkit for LLM watermarking.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Leyi Pan|CREATED|MarkLLM
    MarkLLM|APPLIES_TO|Large Language Models

  proposition: Shen Li et al. introduced Double-I Watermark for protecting model copyright in LLM fine-tuning.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Shen Li|INTRODUCED|Double-I Watermark
    Double-I Watermark|FOCUSES_ON|Model Copyright Protection
    Double-I Watermark|APPLIES_TO|LLM Fine-tuning

  proposition: Gowthami Somepalli and researchers investigated data replication in diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Gowthami Somepalli|INVESTIGATED|Data Replication
    Data Replication|APPLIES_TO|Diffusion Models

  proposition: Nikhil Vyas et al. studied provable copyright protection for generative models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Nikhil Vyas|STUDIED|Copyright Protection
    Copyright Protection|APPLIES_TO|Generative Models

  proposition: Yuxin Wen and team focused on detecting, explaining, and mitigating memorization in diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yuxin Wen|FOCUSED_ON|Memorization Detection
    Memorization Detection|APPLIES_TO|Diffusion Models

  proposition: Zhe Ma and colleagues analyzed memorization in text-to-image diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhe Ma|ANALYZED|Memorization
    Memorization|APPLIES_TO|Text-to-Image Diffusion Models

  proposition: Yingqian Cui et al. developed DiffusionShield, a watermark for copyright protection against generative diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yingqian Cui|DEVELOPED|DiffusionShield
    DiffusionShield|FOCUSES_ON|Copyright Protection
    DiffusionShield|APPLIES_TO|Generative Diffusion Models

  proposition: Yunqing Zhao and authors proposed a recipe for watermarking diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yunqing Zhao|PROPOSED|Watermarking Recipe
    Watermarking Recipe|APPLIES_TO|Diffusion Models

  proposition: Yingqian Cui and team created FT-Shield, a watermark against unauthorized fine-tuning in text-to-image diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yingqian Cui|CREATED|FT-Shield
    FT-Shield|FOCUSES_ON|Unauthorized Fine-tuning Prevention
    FT-Shield|APPLIES_TO|Text-to-Image Diffusion Models

  proposition: Pierre Fernandez et al. introduced the stable signature for rooting watermarks in latent diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Pierre Fernandez|INTRODUCED|Stable Signature
    Stable Signature|APPLIES_TO|Latent Diffusion Models

  proposition: Liangqi Lei and colleagues developed DiffuseTrace, a transparent watermarking scheme for latent diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Liangqi Lei|DEVELOPED|DiffuseTrace
    DiffuseTrace|APPLIES_TO|Latent Diffusion Models

  proposition: Cheng Xiong and authors proposed a flexible and secure watermarking method for latent diffusion models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Cheng Xiong|PROPOSED|Watermarking Method
    Watermarking Method|APPLIES_TO|Latent Diffusion Models
